app_descript:
XFINITY TV Go

Brief: XFINITY TV Go is the quintessential app for XFINITY subscribers to enjoy a plethora of television content on the go. Immerse yourself in live shows, sporting events, and kids' programs. Access a library of movies and shows from premium channels like Starz and HBO as well as popular networks such as ABC and TNT. With the luxury of downloading content to view offline and robust parental controls, XFINITY TV Go ensures entertainment is always at your fingertips.
